content: I will use IC Markets Seychelles for forex trading.I want to withdraw the money to an offshore account and use debit card without tax.What is the cheapest company for offshore company? I prefer Seychelles. There is no tax treaty in Seychelles with my country.If there are cheaper alternatives for company I can choose that. Providing that there is not tax treaty between Turkey and that country.What is the cheapest price for company and banking with debit card?Thank you,Mart
